org.openmap4u.commons

Interface Convertable<T extends Convertable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The convertable type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Angle, Length, Transparence

    public interface Convertable<T extends Convertable>
    All unit enumerations are derived from this base interface.
    Author:
    Michael Hadrbolec

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double convert(double value2Convert)
      Converts the given value into SI units.
      double convert(double value2Convert, T targetUnit)
      Converts the given value into to target units.
      double convertFromSI(double value2Convert)
      Converts the given value from SI units into the provided unit.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        double convert(double value2Convert)
        Converts the given value into SI units.
        Parameters:
        value2Convert - The value to convert.
        Returns:
        The converted value in SI units.

      • convertFromSI

        double convertFromSI(double value2Convert)
        Converts the given value from SI units into the provided unit.
        Parameters:
        value2Convert - The value to convert.
        Returns:
        The converted value in units.

      • convert

        double convert(double value2Convert,
               T targetUnit)
        Converts the given value into to target units.
        Parameters:
        value2Convert - The value to convert.
        targetUnit - The target units.
        Returns:
        The converted value.
